games.summary: Zach LaVine had 31 points, DeMar DeRozan scored 29, and the Sacramento Kings turned back a late rally to hold on for a 135-133 victory over the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday. Russell Westbrook scored on a put back to put the Kings up 126-118, but Antetokounmpo scored the Bucks' next 11 points, cutting the lead to 131-129 with a breakaway dunk.
blurbs: 📋 Ryan Rollins (MIL) made just his 5th start this season. 16 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- — Julius Randle scored 30 points to lead the Minnesota Timberwolves past the Charlotte Hornets 122-105 on Saturday night, their first victory since All-Star Anthony Edwards was sidelined with an injury .
blurbs: 📋 Collin Sexton (CHA) made just his 4th start this season. 9 pts, 2 reb.
📋 Kon Knueppel (CHA) made just his 5th start this season. 5 pts, 8 reb.
📋 Mike Conley (MIN) made just his 3rd start this season. 10 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: Quenton Jackson scored 12 of his 25 points in the fourth quarter as the Indiana Pacers snapped a season-opening five-game losing streak with a 114-109 victory over the Golden State Warriors on Saturday night. Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 24 points.
blurbs: 📋 Isaiah Jackson (IND) made just his 5th start this season. 10 pts, 8 reb.
📋 Jarace Walker (IND) made just his 3rd start this season. 6 pts, 9 reb.
📋 Brandin Podziemski (GS) made just his 3rd start this season. 16 pts, 4 reb.

games.summary: Paolo Banchero had 28 points and 11 rebounds as the Orlando Magic beat the Washington Wizards 125-94 on Saturday night. added 16 points and 12 rebounds, and Franz Wagner scored 25 points as the Magic won consecutive games after an early season four-game skid.

Kevin Durant scored 26 points in three quarters before resting the fourth, Amen Thompson added 17 points and nine rebounds, and the Houston Rockets beat the Boston Celtics 128-101 on Saturday night. and Josh Okogie each scored 12 as Houston won its third straight following an 0-2 start to the season and ended Boston’s three-game win streak.
blurbs: 📋 Josh Minott (BOS) made just his 4th start this season. 10 pts, 6 reb.

games.summary: Jalen Duren had a career high 33 points and also pulled down 10 rebounds, Cade Cunningham added 21 points with 18 assists and the Detroit Pistons pulled away in the fourth quarter to beat the Dallas Mavericks 122-110 in Mexico City on Saturday night.
blurbs: 📋 Max Christie (DAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 13 pts, 6 reb.
